name: 1-5/8 Carat T.G.W. Created Ruby and Diamond Accent Heart Ring in Sterling Silver

reviews.name: 1-5/8 Carat T.G.W. Created Ruby and Diamond Accent Heart Ring in Sterling Silver
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this ring for my 11 year old daughter and I am very pleased with it. For Christmas we purchased what was supposed to be a sterling silver ring elsewhere but in 2 days it had turned her finger green. So I returned it and decided to check out walmart because I wanted something nice, cheap & real sterling. I didn't want to spend a lot because as I said she is 11. When the ring came in site to store and I first saw it...I couldn't believe how beautiful it was. It's even prettier in person than the photo and my daughter loves it!!! No green finger either and she hasn't taken it off since it came in which is about 2 weeks now!!!
reviews.title: Very Pleased!!!

reviews.name: 1-5/8 Carat T.G.W. Created Ruby and Diamond Accent Heart Ring in Sterling Silver
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this ring a few weeks ago and absolutely love it. It is incredibly beautiful. The only comment I will make is that the stone is a little more pink than it appears in the picture.. But regardless of that, very beautiful.
reviews.title: Beautiful doesn't begin to describe it..

reviews.name: 1-5/8 Carat T.G.W. Created Ruby and Diamond Accent Heart Ring in Sterling Silver
reviews.reviewText: This was a gift given to a 14 year old young lady as a Christmas gift. She loved it.
reviews.title: Great for at young lady

reviews.name: 1-5/8 Carat T.G.W. Created Ruby and Diamond Accent Heart Ring in Sterling Silver
reviews.reviewText: The center stone fell out on the first day!
reviews.title: Loose stone.

reviews.name: 1-5/8 Carat T.G.W. Created Ruby and Diamond Accent Heart Ring in Sterling Silver
reviews.reviewText: It is a beautiful ring but the stone I received was much lighter than the picture online it is almost pink instead of red.
reviews.title: Not quiet the right color
